data.name: RPG Sounds - Dungeons of Thamarya - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Dungeons of Thamarya is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Key Keeper
  • Steel Drone
  • Thamaryan Axe

SFX
  • Armor Walk By (4)
  • Lock Open (4)
  • Lock Picking (3)
  • Prisioner Close Lament (5)
  • Prisioner Distant Lament (5)
  • Rat Monster Attack (6)
  • Rat Monster Menace (5)
  • Whip Attack (3)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
